name: The Distracted Spy Fungus demo
description:
A visual novel version of an early conversation between Luke and Lauren of The Distracted Spy. 

Inspired by this brilliant tweet from Rosa Carbó-Mascarell, I decided to make an interactive writing sample of one of the conversations of the Ink game by implementing it in Fungus and assigning Picrew character sprites. 

This was very helpful because the visual aspect of it led me to think about the dialogue that each character uses and made me re-edit it so that it would fit better. 

Credits:

  • Fungus for the implementation
  • slimosine for the character sprites (allows for commercial use)
  • Rosa Carbó-Mascarell for the idea
